SELECT commId_seq.nextval AS id FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO Community (cId, cName, descr, startDate) VALUES (#{id}, #{name}, #{description}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT cId AS id, cName AS name, descr AS description, chairId, u.name As chairName FROM Community c LEFT OUTER JOIN UserInfo u ON c.chairId = u.userId WHERE c.cId = #{id}

SELECT cId, cName, descr, startDate, chairId, ch.name As chairName, m.userId, m.password, m.name, m.email, m.phone FROM Community c LEFT OUTER JOIN UserInfo ch ON c.chairId = ch.userId LEFT OUTER JOIN UserInfo m ON c.cId = m.commId WHERE c.cId = #{id}
SELECT cId AS id, cName AS name, descr AS description, COUNT(u.userId) AS numOfMembers FROM Community c LEFT OUTER JOIN UserInfo u ON c.cId = u.commId GROUP BY cId, cName, descr ORDER BY cName
